title: Exercise 0.6: New note

note over browser:
user enters text in text field
end note
note over browser:
user clicks form submit button with text "Save"
end note
note over browser:
form submits with request payload message=text
end note
browser->server: HTTP POST https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/new_note_spa?message=text
note over server:
the text is appended to the data.json and the oldest note is removed
end note
note over browser:
js-code function redrawNotes() executes and removes the top message and appends
the new message to the bottom
no page reload occurs
end note
